SocialMediaPosting.headline: Katie’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for students to be able to freely learn and not be constrained by standards and objectives…”

– Katie, Middle School Math & Science Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-freely-learn-not-constrained-standards-objectives/
